***WE ARE NOW HIRING BUDTENDERS!! PLEASE SEND RESUME AND THREE PICTURES (NO FILTERS PLEASE) TO normandiebogo@yahoo.com ***

Welcome to Puffy Delivery!

 

Puffy Delivery is an online cannabis collective for medical and recreational cannabis users that offers cannabis delivery directly to your front door.

 

Puffy Delivery only carries products that have been lab tested and meet all state packaging requirements. We are a fully licensed cannabis collective and operate legally under California state law.

 

We offer same-day delivery to Los Angeles, Orange County, San Fernando Valley, San Francisco, Sacramento, and San Diego.

 

Our ETAs are based on location and time. We will try our best to provide an accurate ETA but please note it may be subject to change at any time.

 

You can easily process your order through Weedmaps! If you would like to text in your order, please send the first-time customer required information to the number listed, and a Puffy representative will be in contact with you once your profile has been created.

 

**prices do not include taxes
NOW HIRING! PLEASE SEND RESUME WITH 2 PHOTOS TO THE EMAIL LISTED.
Divine delivery offers only the very best quality Canabis products.please call in for a minimum for delivery to your area

WELCOME TO LA CROWN COLLECTIVE!

We are recreational and medical dispensary that carries a wide variety of some of the best products that are top quality and top grade. We strive to build strong and trustworthy relationships with our patients, mainly to make sure that patients walk away with the right product fit for them. Our volunteers are knowledgeable and educated on a wide scale of strains, products, CBD, and any many brand names. Satisfaction is our number one goal. In the region of South Los Angeles, we are located between the main cross streets of Florence and Hooper, happily open 7 days a week 24 hours a day!
